review: I use this everyday in my vehicle and love it. I did have to put some Velcro on my keyboard to keep it from sliding off. I would recommend the use of Velcro or adhering rubber to the steering wheel device (That is the only reason I gave it a 4* instead of 5*). I have recommended this tray to other Officer's due to it being small enough to fit between the Duty Belt and Steering wheel and easy to store in gear bag.
productTitle: Zone Tech Car Ipad Laptop/Eating Steering Wheel Desk
